title: Towards a risk-based food safety management system in the fresh produce supply chain in Da Nang, Viet Nam
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Thanh Ha Thi Mac, Thi Dong Phuong Nguyen, Minh Nhat Dang, Thi To Quyen Ta, Pauline Spagnoli, Mieke Uyttendaele, Liesbeth Jacxsens
